attributes.background: Reopen rochdale infirmary so Oldham hospital isn't to busy

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a clear action. 

Rochdale infirmary seems to be open, so it is not clear what action you would like Government or Parliament to take. The infirmary is run by the Pennine Acute Hospital Trust. You can find out more here:
http://www.pat.nhs.uk/our-hospitals/rochdale-infirmary/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
